installCommand: if cd flutter; then git pull && cd .. ; else git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable; fi && ls && flutter/bin/flutter doctor && flutter/bin/flutter clean && flutter/bin/flutter config --enable-web
buildCommand: flutter/bin/flutter pub global activate split_icon && flutter/bin/flutter flutter pub global run split_icon && flutter/bin/flutter build web --release
